title: Los Marineros
subtitle: featured case study
description: Los Marineros, a premium yacht manufacturer based in Barcelona, sought a brand refresh, new website, and an immersive 3D configurator for customers. Our goal was to blend luxury and digital innovation to match their brand legacy.
We revamped their web experience with cinematic visuals, an interactive boat builder, and multilingual support targeting high-net-worth customers.
Mobile optimization and SEO upgrades led to significant traffic growth and longer user engagement.
Custom backend built for seamless inventory, lead tracking, and CRM integration.
Partnered with marine lifestyle photographers to generate compelling content for social media and brochures.
Designed a 3D configurator with WebGL for real-time yacht customization.
Integrated secure checkout and inquiry flow with HubSpot CRM.

process.title: Our design process
process.description: From research to real-world testing, our process ensured seamless UX and brand fidelity.

title: Whitehorse
subtitle: featured case study
description: Whitehorse, an equestrian luxury brand in Kentucky, needed a digital catalog and ecommerce site for high-value horse gear. Our team delivered a refined D2C Shopify experience that increased online conversions.
We focused on showcasing craftsmanship, leather quality, and limited collections using dynamic product photography and storytelling.
Integrated personalized product recommendations powered by machine learning.
Delivered a custom checkout flow with Klarna and Stripe integration.
Deployed localized shipping rules and backend inventory sync.
Developed a brand-forward Shopify theme with React-based enhancements.
Automated abandoned cart recovery with Klaviyo workflows.

process.title: Our design process
process.description: Our strategy focused on high-end feel, fast load times, and scalable commerce.

strategies.description: Developed interactive product pages with rich media.

title: Periscope Data
subtitle: featured case study
description: Periscope Data, a business intelligence tool acquired by Sisense, partnered with us to modernize their platformâ€™s UX for enterprise clients. The redesign focused on clarity, speed, and customization.
We audited their analytics suite, simplifying workflows for data analysts.
Created a dark-mode interface and modular dashboards for better data digestion.
Conducted user research with top SaaS clients to refine pain points.
Ensured WCAG 2.1 accessibility compliance across UI.
Delivered a redesigned React interface integrated with their core API.
Added real-time collaboration tools and chart versioning.

process.title: Our design process
process.description: Our iterative strategy aligned technical goals with user-first design.

title: Exabeam
subtitle: featured case study
description: Exabeam, a cybersecurity leader, needed a rebranding campaign and microsite for launching their AI-based SIEM tool. We delivered a high-impact site focused on trust, performance, and scalability.
Built a launch microsite tailored for IT security buyers.
Created explainer videos, interactive threat maps, and a lead magnet system.
Partnered with their internal team to define messaging pillars and design tone.
Delivered design kits and rollout support for internal usage.
Built a headless CMS solution with Prismic and Next.js.
Integrated webinar funnel and gated content analytics.

process.title: Our design process
process.description: A collaborative design and development sprint executed in under 6 weeks.
